posts.post_content: Kleinow, Boston version. $50...card has some recoloring on the front, but still a tough card
Three HOF'ers $125...If you want to make offers on any combo of cards go for it. You can buy all 8(one Kleinow of your choice) for $400

***sold ones listed below in next post*** Commons $15 each. Discounts with four or more. Make offers on any groups, worst I can say is pish posh to your offer. Also check on my ebay page, those cards will be here once the auctions end, so if you see anything you want, let me know. This is everything I got for sale, so let's get it sold!  [url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/z28jd/m.html?item=181136581250&ssPageName=STRK%3AMESELX%3AIT&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562[/url]

Ellam, Hoffman StL, Hofman, Camnitz, Ritchey, Schulte, Adkins, Pfeister, Manning, Ferris and Lindaman all sold

   Still 44 cards left counting the ebay ones!
$70 each for any of the Old Mill backs.  Seitz on hold pending payment

Huggins $45 each or $85 for the pair. Peruse the rest of the items and combine for savings

Also this Engle miscut is still available. $70 which seems cheap because a crop mark in that shape would go for this much, this card has the top of another Piedmont back on it. Heck, if you want to trade a crop mark for it, that's what I collect! [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=167752[/url]
Just received my package from your last thread.  Loving them!  Thanks for packing them so well.

Glad you like them!  I got a card last week in a flimsy plastic holder and nothing else in an envelope, don't know how someone could mail out a t206 card like that. Didn't even have a fragile, or do not bend stamp

Karger P150 $70...O'Neill P350 $65

  sold list:Ellam, Hoffman StL, Hofman, Camnitz, Ritchey, Schulte, Adkins, Pfeister, Manning, Ferris, Bates, Beck, Bergen and Lindaman

Stanage, a real beauty for a 4 $70....lots of stuff left from the stuff up top, only 14 cards have sold. Make some offers if you see multiple things you like...last two cards will be added tomorrow, T206 Brain sgc50 and Carlos Smith GAI2, both are still active on ebay until tomorrow morning. I'll add a scan for the Engle too. Then I'll list(price) everything individually in the second post tomorrow

Last two cards. Brain $50 and Smith $60...make offers on any if you combine cards. I'll post individual prices later when I get a chance. I believe there are about 42 cards left total from top to bottom. Post just above has all the sold cards listed
